segments.text: Dad , what are we doing tonight for fun ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We're going over to Mrs . Smith's place to help her with her yard work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yard work ? I said ' what are we doing for fun ' , not work !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It will be fun . And besides , you'll be in the best company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Dad . You're so cute . What do I need to do to help get ready ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You could get the rakes and some shovels together and I'll put them in the car .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Jeans and a tee shirt , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes and maybe a jacket in case it gets cool .
segments.speaker: S2
